item.title: Stallman and Free Software
item.description: I’ve long been a fan of Free Software - both the technical aspects and the moral implications. As such, I’ve long been somewhat of a fan of RMS, and have followed his public persona. I’ve had the experience of exchanging short emails with him, and was lucky enough …
